description: Amplify uses this action to refresh a previously issued access token that might have expired.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The third-party provider for the token. The only valid value is figma.

parameters.name: refreshTokenBody
parameters.description: Information about the refresh token request. The token to use to refresh a previously issued access token that might have expired. clientId (string) --- The ID of the client to request the token from.

nested_params.name: token
nested_params.description: The token to use to refresh a previously issued access token that might have expired.

nested_params.name: clientId
nested_params.description: The ID of the client to request the token from.

nested_items.name: expiresIn
nested_items.description: The date and time when the new access token expires.
